description: The AP_CLAIM table contains one record for each claim in the managed care system's AP Claims module.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ORIG_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: Stores the original claim number after it is changed.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique category identifier of the claims processing status, such as whether it is pending, clean, denied, or void.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New


Pending


Denied


Clean


Void

columns.name: AP_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique category identifier of the claim's AP status or NULL if the claim has not been sent to AP.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Released to Accounts Payable


Batched for Payment


EOB Generated

columns.name: DATE_RECEIVED
columns.description: The date the accounts payable claim was received.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the member was admitted to the place of service.

columns.name: ADMISSION_HOUR
columns.description: The hour at which the member was admitted to the place of service.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the accounts payable claim was entered into Epic.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the service area associated with this accounts payable claim.

columns.name: NUM_PROC
columns.description: The number of procedures on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: TOT_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The total billed amount on the claim.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: The total patient portion on the claim.

columns.name: TOT_NET_PAYABLE
columns.description: The total net payable amount on the claim.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: Stores the identifier of the coverage used to process the claim.

columns.name: SERV_DATE
columns.description: Stores the service start date for the first service line on the claim.

columns.name: ASSOC_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the specialty associated with the accounts payable claim record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value representing the member's discharge disposition/status as of the service end date.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the provider associated with the claim. This provider can be set through manual workflows or is matched to during claim load/processing.

columns.name: ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value representing the origin or source of admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The external claim identification number. Note: This is not used for linking purposes.

columns.name: PAY_BY_DATE
columns.description: The date by which the accounts payable claim should be paid.

columns.name: NETWORK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the network associated with this accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: NETWORK_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: METH_TO_PAY_CLM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier of the method used to pay the claim, such as whether it was paid as primary or secondary.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Primary Coverage


Coordination of Benefits


Maintenance of Benefits


COB Savings


Preservation of Benefits

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_INS_AMT
columns.description: The amount already paid towards the billed amount on the claim by primary payors. This is applicable only if the claim has been submitted to your facility as the secondary payor.

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_PAT_PORT
columns.description: Displays the amount the primary payors adjudicated as the patient portion. This is applicable only if the claim has been submitted to your facility as the secondary payor.

columns.name: TOT_ADJUSTMENT
columns.description: The total adjustment amount associated with the accounts payable claims record.

columns.name: ADMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value representing the type of admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TOT_INSURANCE_AMT
columns.description: The total insurance amount associated with the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DX_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the admitting diagnosis on the claim.

columns.name: TOT_NET_INSURANCE
columns.description: The total net insurance amount remaining after deducting all applicable adjustments and other payments from the total insurance amount.

columns.name: E_CODE_ID
columns.description: The ID number representing the external cause of the injury treated by procedures on the claim. This column will be deprecated in the May 2025 release. It is being replaced by column CODE_DX_ID in table EXTERNAL_CAUSES_OF_INJURY.

columns.name: TYPE_OF_BILL
columns.description: The type of bill associated with the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: RCVD_BY_CARRIER_DT
columns.description: The date the accounts payable claim was received by the carrier.

columns.name: HCFA_UNCLEAN_YN
columns.description:
An indication of whether the CMS claim contained errors.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Clean


Unclean

columns.name: ORIG_REV_CLM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the original claim related to a reversed claim.

columns.name: ADJST_CLM_ID
columns.description: The ID number of an adjustment claim.

columns.name: ORIG_ADJST_CLM_ID
columns.description: If a claim is an adjustment claim, this represents the ID number of the original claim being adjusted.

columns.name: REF_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the referring provider for the claim, if supplied.

columns.name: TOT_U_AND_C_AMT
columns.description: The total usual and customary amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_DISALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The total disallowed amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_NOT_COVD_AMT
columns.description: The total not covered amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: The total deductible for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_COPAY
columns.description: The total copay for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_COINS
columns.description: The total coinsurance amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_TOTAL
columns.description: The total patient portion for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_BBEN_PNLTY
columns.description: The total before benefit penalty amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_EXD_BEN_AMT
columns.description: The total exceeded benefit amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_ACUTE_AMT
columns.description: The total acute medication amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_CHRONIC_AMT
columns.description: The total chronic medication amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_AMT
columns.description: The total patient medication amount for the claim.

columns.name: IN_OUT_NET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the claim is in- or out-of-network.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


IN NETWORK


OUT OF NETWORK


N/A

columns.name: RKP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the risk panel associated with the claim.

columns.name: RKP_ID_RISK_PANEL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the risk panel.

columns.name: CLM_LOB_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the line of business associated with the claim. This is the LOB determined at adjudication.

columns.name: CLM_LOB_ID_LOB_NAME
columns.description: The name of the line of business record.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique category identifier of the workflow this claim was created as part of. Standard AP Claims processed through Tapestry will store 0 or NULL in this column.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


AP claims


Reprice claims


Export only


Shadow claims


Paid claims


Paid claims with bucket update


Pre-adjudicated external claims


Estimate claims


Adjudicated external claims

columns.name: SENSITIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique category identifier of the sensitivity applied to the claim, if any. This value is used to restrict access within Hyperspace. The values in AP_CLAIM_ANALYTICS_SENS are distinct and intended for use with reporting.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SERVICE_START_DATE
columns.description: The earliest service start date among all services on the claim.

columns.name: SERVICE_END_DATE
columns.description: The service end date for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_COB_SAVING
columns.description: The total Coordination of Benefits (COB) savings amount for the claim.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_OUT_PCKT
columns.description: The total patient out-of-pocket amount for the claim.

columns.name: SHADOW_RECON_AMT
columns.description: The shadow reconciliation threshold amount for the claim.

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) associated with the claim.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: TIF_NUM
columns.description: The tax increment financing (TIF) number for the claim.

columns.name: LIFEMAX_AMT_IN
columns.description: The amount applied to the patient's in-network lifetime maximum buckets for this claim.

columns.name: LIFEMAX_AMT_OUT
columns.description: The amount applied to the patient's out-of-network lifetime maximum buckets for this claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_FORMAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the format of the claim (CMS, UB, Rx).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CMS


UB


Rx

columns.name: OTHER_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the other provider on the claim, if supplied.

columns.name: OPERATING_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the operating provider on the claim, if supplied.

columns.name: ADJ_TIME
columns.description: The adjudication date and time of the claim.

columns.name: ATTEND_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the attending provider on the claim, if supplied.

columns.name: TOT_COB_SV_PAYOUT
columns.description: The total amount of Coordination of Benefits (COB) savings member payout.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: Stores unique identifier of the place of service associated with the claim.

columns.name: TOT_SEC_DIS
columns.description: The total amount of secondary discount from all the services added up.

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_FAC
columns.description: The total primary factor amounts from all the services added up.

columns.name: TOT_CODE_EDIT_SAV
columns.description: The total amount of code edit savings for this claim.

columns.name: INTEREST_AMT_OVRD
columns.description: This stores the override interest amount for the claim.

columns.name: RTF_EOB_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Contains the most recently generated rich text explanation of benefits report.

columns.name: INFO_CVG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the additional coverage record associated with the accounts payable claim record for informational and reporting purposes.

columns.name: CLM_PRIM_INS_AMT
columns.description: Claim-level primary insurance amount to allocate between procedures

columns.name: CLM_PRIM_PAT_AMT
columns.description: Claim-level primary patient amount to allocate between procedures

columns.name: STATUS_DATE
columns.description: The status date of the claim.

columns.name: PEND_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the pend type for this claim


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


External


Open


Internal

columns.name: CL_DEN_PEND_EXAM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claims examiner who applied a status of clean, deny, or pend to this claim.

columns.name: CL_DEN_PEND_DTTM
columns.description: The date that a status of clean, deny, or pend was applied to this claim.

columns.name: VOID_EXAMINER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who voided this claim.

columns.name: VOID_CHNG_DATETIME
columns.description: The date the claim was voided.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_DT
columns.description: The date of accident associated with the claim.

columns.name: ER_ENTRY_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time of entry to emergency room.

columns.name: IN_NET_ADJUD_OVRD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value corresponding to the in network adjudication override reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DRG_PRICING_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether Diagnosis Related Groups (DRG) were used to price this claim. 'Y' indicates that DRG pricing was used, 'N' indicates that it was not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: WORKFLOW_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the workflow payor ID associated with this claim.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: TOT_BILLED_ENT
columns.description: The total billed entered for this claim.

columns.name: TOT_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The total allowed amount for this claim.

columns.name: TOT_WITHHOLDING
columns.description: The total withholding for this claim.

columns.name: TOT_DISCOUNT
columns.description: Total discount amount for this claim.

columns.name: ADJ_NET_PAID
columns.description: Adjusted net paid for this claim.

columns.name: ADJ_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: Adjusted patient portion for this claim.

columns.name: MEM_PRIMARY_NET_ID
columns.description: The ID of the member's primary network.

columns.name: MEM_PRIMARY_NET_ID_NETWORK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the network.

columns.name: LIFEMAX_ETR_DATA
columns.description: The lifetime max transactions data for this claim.

columns.name: INBASKET_MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the in basket message associated with this claim.

columns.name: STMT_COV_FROM_DATE
columns.description: Start date for statement covers.

columns.name: STMT_COV_TO_DATE
columns.description: End date for statement covers.

columns.name: MSP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether Medicare is listed as a secondary payor on the claim record. 'Y' indicates that Medicare is a secondary payor, 'N' indicates that it is not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CLM_REPRICER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the 3rd party claim pricer

columns.name: CLM_REPRICER_ID_RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The number of covered days on the claim.

columns.name: NONCOVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The number of noncovered days on the claim.

columns.name: COINS_DAYS
columns.description: The number of coinsurance days on the claim.

columns.name: LIFETIME_RESRV_DAYS
columns.description: The number of lifetime reserve days for inpatient claims.

columns.name: ILL_INJ_LMP_DATE
columns.description: Date of injury/illness.

columns.name: INTEREST_TO_DT
columns.description: The to date for interest calculation for the claim. Used when the associated check which was returned is voided.

columns.name: DISCHRG_HR_UB92_FMT
columns.description: The discharge hour listed on UB claims.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who created the adjustment for this claim.

columns.name: ADJST_CREATE_DATE
columns.description: The date the adjustment claim was created.

columns.name: REFUNDED_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
Flag indicating if the claim has been refunded.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: EMPY_RELATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether patient's condition is related to employment.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: AUTO_ACDNT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the state where the auto accident occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISABILITY_FROM_DT
columns.description: The date the disability started.

columns.name: DISABILITY_TO_DT
columns.description: The date the disability ended.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: The date patient was discharged.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB_YN
columns.description:
Indicate if lab services outside the provider's office are involved.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: EMPY_RELATED_YN

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB_CHARGE
columns.description: The cost of services performed at the outside lab.

columns.name: RELATED_CONDITION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Information regarding related condition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Auto


Other Party Liability


Other Accident Related Injury


Patient Employment


Crime Victim

columns.name: WGT_BED_DAYS
columns.description: Total weight of bed days.

columns.name: TOT_CONV_DAYS_RFL
columns.description: To store the total converted bed days on the only attached referral with bed days information in it.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the benefit plan used to adjudicate the claim.

columns.name: BENEFIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: PLAN_GROUP_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the plan group for the coverage used to pay the claim, as of adjudication.

columns.name: PLAN_GROUP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: ENTRY_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the accounts payable claim record was created.
